welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hockley, a charming city known for its beautiful countryside and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Hockley has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for overflow flights and some low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport is reserved for VIP and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
